## Dictionary.getProperty() method

Retrieves a property definition by it's qname

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getProperty(qname: QNameWithTypeTagConsumer<QNameTypeTag.PROPERTY>): PropertyDefinition;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | QNameWithTypeTagConsumer&lt;QNameTypeTag.PROPERTY&gt; | The qualified name of the property to fetch |

<b>Returns:</b>

PropertyDefinition

A property definition, or a generated residual property when no property exists for the requested qname
